body: Hum, kind of disappointed, the way the story is going disappointed me. In the first chapter the mom personality was different, in this one they just changed her personality and reactions to force this plot, it's like a really forceful change of mind that happened on her, I liked anyway but it could've been better, especially because it lost all its incest quality, the thing about incest is that it should be a forbidden love, like a kind of complex relationship and all, and the first chapter had this feeling, but the second one is just lewdness, let's see if the third one has something more.
I hope this doujin dosent go downhill...
Its Chapter 2, the chinese and Japanese complete version have the real first chapter.
Too bad it all goes down hill from here.
